sentence: President Joe Biden informed Republican Senate candidates Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker that they needed to resign from the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition or they would be removed.
author: Misty Severi
title: Biden forces out Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from fitness council

sentence: In Georgias Senate race, Mr. Trumps support for Herschel Walker kept serious rivals away.
title: Primaries Show Limits, and Depths, of Trumps Power Over G.O.P. Base

sentence: You can watch the blow-up below: NOW WATCH: Herschel Walker argues with reporter Trump 'never said' election was stolen
author: Tom Boggioni
title: The View gets heated as Kellyanne Conway refuses to answer questions about her allegiance to Trump
